div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1069 Kerch' (anc. Panticapaeum), Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1877 Burial: c. 300-275 B.C. Contents: c. 500 AE. Pot hoard Panticapaeum: AE (as BMC 23) Disposition: dispersed â€ Liutsenko, p. 19 Prushevskaia, TONGE 1945, p. 23 Possibly from the same hd. as nos. 1068 and 1105
